title: Tomato, chicory and goats' cheese salad

ingredients.item: 2 x 250g packs Waitrose 1 Mixed Baby Tomatoes , halved

instructions.step: Wash and drain the spelt. Add to a pan and cover with cold water. Bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes until tender. Drain then set aside to cool. Thinly slice the Jack Hawkins tomatoes and spread them out on 4 plates; season.

To make the dressing, mix the vinegar, oil and garlic. Pour ½ into a large bowl; set the rest aside. Cut the base off the chicory, then separate the leaves and add to the bowl with the spelt, baby tomatoes and basil; season and toss to combine. Scatter the spelt mix over the tomato slices, then fi nish with the crumbled goats’ cheese and remaining dressing.
